frontmatter.title: How to poll your audience
frontmatter.metaTitle: How to poll your audience with Reactive
frontmatter.metaDesc: How to easily poll your audience and display the results with Reactive Live Shopping.

pageProps.content:
Polling your audience is easy with Reactive.

1. First, [open the Reactive Live Shopping app in Shopify](/support/get-started-in-shopify/).

2. Select the *"Polls"* interaction in the interaction panel.
![Select Polls interaction](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-send-a-poll/select-polls.png)

3. Write a poll question and up to four poll choices.
![Configure the poll](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-send-a-poll/configure-poll.png)

4. Click the *"Send Poll"* button and all participants will be able to view and the poll and select the option of their choice.
![Send the poll](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-send-a-poll/send-poll.png)
![View the poll](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-send-a-poll/poll-customers.png)

5. Click the *"Send Results"* button to display the results of the poll to all participants.
![Send poll results](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-send-a-poll/send-results.png)
![Send poll results](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-send-a-poll/view-results.png)

6. The results will stop showing automatically after 10 seconds. If you wish to stop showing the results sooner, you can click the *"Clear Poll"* button before the 10 seconds has elapsed.
